settings.title: Where does the free shipping apply?
settings.text: We have free shipping all over USA

settings.title: What is the shipping timeframe?
settings.text: Our shipping is between 7 to 10 business days.

settings.title: Which carrier do you use?
settings.text: We ship your products via UPS and/or USPS.

settings.title: What happens if I don't receive mi package after the time frame?
settings.text: You can let us know by sending an email to sales@aromely.com, so we can check what happened and give you a resolution!

settings.title: What happens if my item arrived broken?
settings.text: You'll have to let us know by sending an email to sales@aromely.com and attach pictures of your item so we can let you know about the next steps.

settings.title: How do I start a return?
settings.text: If you want to return an item, you can let us know via email to sales@aromely.com so we can guide you step by step, or going to our return policy!

settings.title: How do you process my refund?
settings.text: After we process your return, we will process your refund to the same payment method that you used.

settings.title: If I return an item, how long does my refund would take?
settings.text: We process refunds immediately, but depending on your bank processing time, it can take between 5 to 7 business days to be reflected on your account.

settings.title: How often should I clean my diffuser?
settings.text: In order to mantain a healthy diffuser you should clean it every 2 to 3 months.

settings.title: How do I clean my diffuser?
settings.text: Once your oil bottle is empty, you'll have to re-fill it with at least a 95% pure alcohol and let it work with 100% intensity for at least 15 minutes. Once it stops working, you can use it normally.

settings.title: How safe is my oil blend?
settings.text: It is 100% safe! You can use it around your pets and kids without any problem!

settings.title: What is the recommended usage?
settings.text:
We recommend the standard usage from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

Working time → 40 to 50 seconds.
Pause time → 100 to 120 seconds.
